Class CalendarFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • CalendarFrame

  • public class CalendarFrame
extends java.lang.Object
    CalendarFrame displays an interactive calendar that allows you to input different events for certain dates as well as other features such as exercises or a funny picture.
    Author:
    Timothy Nguyen, Andy Wu, William Luna

    • Constructor Detail

      • CalendarFrame

        public CalendarFrame(EventList theEventList)
        Main Constructor of the main calendar frame, calFrame. Initializes the fields getInfo, eventList, quoteFrame, quote, dayFrame, calInfo, calPanel. Calls methods addDaysOfWeek, addDays, setUpMonthButtons, addQuoteoftheDay, and listEventButton.
        Parameters:
        theEventList -

    • Method Detail

      • removeDays

        private void removeDays()
        Method to remove the days of the month on the calendar (calPanel). Used when switching between months

      • addDays

        private void addDays()
        Method to add the days of the month on the calendar (calPanel). Used when switching between months. Calls updateCalendar

      • addDaysOfWeek

        private void addDaysOfWeek()
        This method is used to form the buttons to label days of the week of each column on the calendar (calPanel)

      • setUpMonthButtons

        private void setUpMonthButtons()
        Method to set up the buttons displaying the month/year and to go to the previous/next month on monthPanel. Uses getInfo. Calls removeDays, addDays

      • addQuoteOfTheDay

        private void addQuoteOfTheDay(java.awt.GridBagConstraints GBC)
        Method to get random quote for the day/month, sets up label to display on the main calendar frame. Uses quote, quoteFrame, calFrame
        Parameters:
        GBC -

      • removeActionListeners

        private void removeActionListeners()
        Method to remove the listeners of the day buttons. Used when switching months due to resetting of buttons. Uses dates

      • listEventButton

        private void listEventButton(java.awt.GridBagConstraints gbc)
        Method used the form the button to open the frame for list of events. Calls showEvents, memeButton. Uses eventPanel, calFrame
        Parameters:
        gbc -

      • showEvents

        private void showEvents()
        Method used to display a new frame displaying all events on the calendar. Uses eventList, monthNames

      • updateCalendar

        private void updateCalendar()
        Method to update the calendar frame whenever a change in the calendar happens. Calls removeActionListeners, displayDateFrame. Uses dates, calInfo, currentMonth, currentDay, currentYear, getInfo, eventList

      • displayDateFrame

        private void displayDateFrame()
        Method to display a new Date frame when a date is clicked. Calls clearDateFrame, toAddEventFrame, toRemoveEventFrame. Uses currentDateEventList, eventList, currentMonth, currentDay, currentYear, dayFrame, monthNames

      • clearDateFrame

        private void clearDateFrame()
        Method to exit Fate frame, used when a new date button is clicked, the "Add Event" button is clicked, or the "Remove Event" button is clicked. Uses dayFrame

      • cuteAnimalButton

        private void cuteAnimalButton()
        Method used to create interactive button for cute animal. Uses eventPanel

      • exerciseButton

        private void exerciseButton()
        Method used to create interactive button for a random exercise. Opens new frame when clicked. Uses eventPanel

      • memeButton

        private void memeButton()
        Method used to create interactive button to display funny meme image. Uses eventPanel

      • isValidHour

        Checks if value is a valid hour value in the 24hr format
        Parameters:

        Checks if values is a valid minute value within an hour
        Parameters:
        minute -
        Returns:
        true or false

      • toAddEventFrame

        private void toAddEventFrame()
        Method used to create new frame when the "Add Event" button is clicked in the Date frame. Calls clearDateFrame, saveEventList, displayDateFrame. Uses dayFrame, currentMonth, currentDay, currentYear, eventList

      • removeEvent

        private void removeEvent(Event e)
        Method used to remove event from the Event list. Calls saveEventList. Uses eventList
        Parameters:
        e -

      • toReadableTime

        private java.lang.String[] toReadableTime(int[] time)
        Method used to convert the time from integer to string.
        Parameters:
        time -
        Returns:
        readable

      • toRemoveEventFrame

        private void toRemoveEventFrame()
        Method used to create new frame when the "Remove Event" button is clicked in the Date frame. Calls clearDateFrame, removeEvent, displayDateFrame, toReadableTime. Uses dayFrame, currentDateEventList
